plot: Two unlikely lovers, a man born into slavery and an emotionally-unhinged woman unable to nurture a pet, form the core of this beautiful allegorical nightmare.
title: Of Bitches & Hounds
plot_es: Two unlikely lovers, a man born into slavery and an emotionally-unhinged woman unable to nurture a pet, form the core of this beautiful allegorical nightmare.
plot_en: Two unlikely lovers, a man born into slavery and an emotionally-unhinged woman unable to nurture a pet, form the core of this beautiful allegorical nightmare.
